definition: the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance

sentences.english: The CrossCorrelation is an essential means of getting disturbing industrial frequency.
sentences.chinese: 互相關函數是確定工頻干擾噪聲頻率的一個重要手段。

sentences.english: The method of noise source identification and location based on Wave Superposition Method(WSM) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於波疊加的噪聲源識別和定位方法。

sentences.english: A model for the removal of multiplicative noises was proposed based on the non-local diffusion method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於非局部擴散的去除乘性噪聲的模型。

sentences.english: The method can be used to reduce the noise of projections and filter non-white noise.
sentences.chinese: 該方法能降低投影數據的噪聲，而且能過濾非白噪聲。

sentences.english: The method can be used to reduce the noise of projections and filter non-white noise.
sentences.chinese: 該方法能降低投影數據的噪聲，而且能過濾非白噪聲。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic noises of H-field antenna dominated the receiving depth and receiving quality.
sentences.chinese: 拖曳天線的本地噪聲決定了其接收深度及接收性能。

sentences.english: With deep submicron technology, crosstalk noise becomes more and more serious.
sentences.chinese: 隨着深亞微米技術，串擾噪聲問題越來越嚴重。

sentences.english: Someone complained about hearing some cat-like noises at night.
sentences.chinese: 有些人抱怨晚上會聽到類似貓叫的噪聲。

sentences.english: The sleep spindles may be “colliding” with the sounds and blocking their progress.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠紡錘波可能與聲音“相撞“並阻止噪聲進入。

sentences.english: Article concludes with a phase-locked loop phase noise improvement approach.
sentences.chinese: 文中最後提出了改善鎖相環相位噪聲的辦法。

sentences.english: Sound conditioning experimental model of animals was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立噪聲習服實驗動物模型。

sentences.english: Finally, the filtered image is thresholded to produce the edge image.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對濾波圖像閾值化以得到噪聲圖像的邊緣圖。

sentences.english: Over that time span, ambient noise levels went up.
sentences.chinese: 在這段時間內，環境噪聲分貝直線上升。

sentences.english: In the ultrasonic testing of coarse grain materials, signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) is very low due to the serious structure noise.
sentences.chinese: 粗晶材料超聲檢測時，嚴重的結構噪聲使信噪比很低。

sentences.english: Wholly reducing bus interior noise level needs to consider multi -paths by which several noise sources radiate sound into the bus.
sentences.chinese: 整體降低客車車內噪聲水平的需求日益迫切。

sentences.english: He couldn't sleep well with the noise loud outside.
sentences.chinese: 由於外邊噪聲很大，他沒睡好覺。

definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
